title: Updated lighting throughout the apartment home
posting_body: Virtual and Contact-Free Leasing and Move-In Available
34824 Birch Grove Road, Sterling Heights, MI, 48312
Follow This Link for More Information:
APARTMENTS IN SOUTHERN SUBURB OF DETROIT
This is a 2 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 1000 Sq.
Spacious living areas, updated furnishings, and energy efficient appliances are what you’ll find in our one- or two-bedroom floor plans.
Maple Grove offers comfort, affordability and convenience in one beautifully manicured, tranquil community.

In-home amenities like individually controlled AC and heat, walk-in closets and beautifully designed kitchens with oak cabinetry are just a few of the benefits of living in Maple Grove of Sterling Heights.
- Common laundry room with full size GE wash and dryer
- Soft hued paint accented with white paneled doors
- Large picture windows fitted with designer selected blinds
- Accent walls in living area of apartment home
- Spacious living room and bedrooms featuring plush neutral carpet
- Beautifully designed kitchen featuring oak cabinetry, GE white appliances and dark walnut vinyl plank flooring
- Gas range in all apartment homes
- Well-designed floor plans ranging from 800 to 1000 square feet
- Updated lighting throughout the apartment home
- Exercise room with flat screen television
- On-line Resident Portal (see Resident Services tab)
- Beautifully designed outdoor swimming pool and expansive pool deck
- Common laundry room with full size GE wash and dryer
- Pet friendly - cats and dogs- limited dog approved buildings and restricted breeds do apply.
South side of 15 mile, in between Van Dyke and Hoover
$200 security deposit / $100 refundable after move out
$200 security deposit / $100 refundable after move out
Two and a half times the rent
30 days of most recent income pay stubs
